statements: DELETE FROM tax_credits_and_incentives WHERE company_name = 'ABC Inc.' AND tax_credit_year = 2021;
DELETE FROM tax_credits_and_incentives WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' AND tax_credit_name = 'Research Credit';
DELETE FROM tax_credits_and_incentives WHERE tax_credit_year = 2020 AND tax_credit_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM incentives WHERE percentage < 2.5 AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM tax_records WHERE taxpayer_id = 1001 AND tax_year = 2022 AND tax_type = 'income_tax';
